channel.title: We Wish You A Married Christmas
channel.desc: Taking advice from their marriage coach, a struggling couple go to a quiet town to reconnect at Christmas. Can they rekindle their flame.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Great Christmas Snow-In
channel.desc: Justin retreats to his honeymoon cabin but gets snowed in with his ex's cousin. When his ex arrives, secrets, sparks and second chances emerge.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Novel Noel
channel.desc: A book editor takes on a temporary gig running a bookstore, where her battles with the owner's son allow her to rediscover her passion for nurturing creativity.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Stars
channel.desc: When aspiring R&B artist Layla crosses paths with amateur songwriter Spence, she thinks she's found her shot at finally getting a record deal.

channel.title: The Christmas Contest
channel.desc: Two exes are thrown together when they both enter a Christmas contest to win money for the charity of their choosing. Could they walk away with more than money.

channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wiser Men And A Boy
channel.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mum's new boyfriend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Touchdown
channel.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone from the Chiefs' front office along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Bookshop
channel.desc: The story of a structured Christmas expert and a laid-back bookstore owner who clash, but their rivalry blossoms into a heart-warming romance.

channel.title: The Great Christmas Snow-In

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
channel.desc: Annie faces her first obstacle as CEO of Cooper's Cookies when grandma's secret recipe is stolen! Can she and local baker Sam recreate the beloved recipe.

channel.desc: After best-selling author Harrington's social media comments ruffle feathers, publicist April's damage control plan means spending Christmas together.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mystery On Mistletoe Lane
channel.desc: Heidi discovers a Christmas mystery in her historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Believe In Christmas
channel.desc: When Beatrice reluctantly joins her best friend on a trip to the enchanting Christmasland, she remains sceptical. But festive traditions and a friendly stranger warms her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: To All A Good Night
channel.desc: When a small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who is in town to buy her family's parkland, she may have inadvertently saved Christmas with him.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Holiday Story
channel.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Christmas Quest
channel.desc: When an archaeologist begins a search for an ancient Christmas treasure, she must team up with her ex-husband - who is an expert in Nordic languages - to find it.

channel.title: Joyeux Noel
channel.desc: When a painting of a Christmas market captures the imagination of copy editor Lea, she heads to France with reporter Mark to uncover the mystery behind the artist.
